transcripts.text: as the sun rose over los angeles california on the morning of august fifth nineteen sixty two word had already spread that something was amiss at one two three o five.  fifth helena drive.
this is the secluded spanish cottage in the exclusive brentwood section of los angeles where actress marilyn monroe died bottled with sleeping pills near her bed.

The most famous woman on the planet was suddenly gone.  The blonde bombshell, a sex symbol like no other.  The film goddess was dead at 36.  Her life and death would become an industry built on wish fulfillment, opportunism, and wild speculation.  Was it an accident, a suicide, or was she murdered by the CIA, the Mafia, President John F. Kennedy, or his brother, the Attorney General?
Marilyn was killed by aliens from outer space.  Marilyn was killed by Bobby Kendi suffocating her.  There are so many different stories.
The police report noted that on the nightstand there were about 15 bottles of medication, including a bottle of Nembutal, which should have contained about 50 pills.
